channel.title: Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory
channel.description: Anyone Play Wolfenstein:ET? It's basically a free online FPS game. its not that bad either. WWII times. reminds me of BF1942. Pick a class. Go assault/defend objective. yeah. its unique in it's experience system though. Longer you play, the more experience you get. so theres 3 catagories. weaponary, battle sense. and the third one is whatever class you picked. Let's say i picked Medic. So i start playing. And So i build Experience. and with some set experience i gain a level. 4 levels total in each catagory. So with each new level. I get upgrades. Like faster reload time. More medikits to distribte. Run faster. Etc. Etc. I think the last upgrade in weaponary is dual pistols. So anyway. Its a fairly good game. I don't have a link on hand. but google it. shouldnt be hard to find. Remember...It's free...

item.title: Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory
item.description:
@2142 wrote:

Anyone Play Wolfenstein:ET? It’s basically a free online FPS game. its not that bad either. WWII times. reminds me of BF1942. Pick a class. Go assault/defend objective. yeah. its unique in it’s experience system though. Longer you play, the more experience you get. so theres 3 catagories. weaponary, battle sense. and the third one is whatever class you picked. Let’s say i picked Medic. So i start playing. And So i build Experience. and with some set experience i gain a level. 4 levels total in each catagory. So with each new level. I get upgrades. Like faster reload time. More medikits to distribte. Run faster. Etc. Etc. I think the last upgrade in weaponary is dual pistols. So anyway. Its a fairly good game. I don’t have a link on hand. but google it. shouldnt be hard to find. Remember…It’s free…
